newsitem.title: USA: Hein-Werner completes sale to Kaydon.
newsitem.headline: Hein-Werner completes sale to Kaydon.

text.p: Hein-Werner Corp said Thursday it completed the sale of its Great Bend Industries Division to Kaydon Corp for about $22.5 million in cash.
Sale proceeds will be used to reduce debt, strengthen the company's balance sheet and give the company more flexibility to pursue growth opportunities in the future, Hein-Werner said.
Great Bend provides hydraulic cylinders and related hydraulic components. It employs about 230 people and had 1996 net sales of about $20 million.
Hein-Werner provides collision repair and engine reconditioning equipment.
